fig.alt-text: Six grid maps plotting Northings (y-axis) and Eastings (x-axis). (a), (b) and (c) plot the R0 values for 1971–2000, RCP45 2011–2040, and RCP45 2041–2070, respectively. (d), (e) and (f) plot the 95% confidence interval for 1971–2000, RCP45 2011–2040, and RCP45 2041–2070, respectively.
